WorkItem.Description: As per the title, the boss handler needs to take into account the 25% health and damage reduction (15% on heroic).  Otherwise we are all aiming at fights that are significantly harder than what they actually are now.
WorkItem.Summary: [Boss Handler] Need to update for recent Firelands nerfs

Comments.Message:
I have the general damages nerfed in my local build. What I'm trying to do is the updated health values for all of the bosses before I post. Considering the guild I'm in is 6/7 HM 25-man, and our alt group (with the latest nerfs) is 3/7 HM 10man, I have the health values for most of the hard mode bosses. I'm just missing a few of the normal bosses:

Shannox - Just missing 25-man normal + Rage/rip's health
Alysrazor - Missing 25-man normal, 10-man heroic
Bethtilac - Missing 25-man normal
Lord Rhyolith - Missing 25-man normal
Baleroc - Missing 25-man normal
Majordomo - Missing 25-man normal
Ragnaros - Missing 10-man heroic

Now half of these I will probably be able to get a hold of tomorrow on my druid (kitty stealth ftw), however Alysrazor, Majordomo, Rag, and maybe Shannox (depending on when our Raid leader decides to switch to heroic raid mode) I will probably not get. But once I get Beth, Baleroc, and Rhyolith tomorrow, I'll post an update.
